original_title: Regenerative Medicine and Stem Cells: The Need for Patient Self-Advocacy
overview: The ability to clone organs, reprogram DNA, and manipulate stem cells, was once thought to only be the storyline subjects of wild, science-fiction fantasy books and B-movies.  However the recent advances in medical and scientific research are now proving stem cell therapy is on the cusp of becoming the most important development in these fields.  This film looks at this issue from all angles.
title: Regenerative Medicine and Stem Cells: The Need for Patient Self-Advocacy
